compatibility.notes: BUSL-1.1 is a source-available license that allows for proprietary use, but it has specific restrictions when combined with copyleft licenses.

key_requirements: Rights terminate if the license terms are violated.
Must specify the Change License as GPL Version 2.0 or a compatible license.
license.name: BUSL-1.1
obligations: Display the license conspicuously on each original or modified copy of the Licensed Work.
Purchase a commercial license if the use does not comply with the requirements of the license.
Comply with the terms of the Change License after the Change Date.
